simulated_ratings.feeling: Glossy temptation tale without the warmth or wit I gravitate toward.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Easygoing, self-deprecating storytelling that kept me smiling.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Angering and sobering, a solid piece of advocacy filmmaking.

simulated_ratings.title: Tom and Jerry: The Lost Dragon (2014)

simulated_ratings.title: Total Frat Movie (2016)

simulated_ratings.title: From a Roman Balcony (1960)

simulated_ratings.title: Om Shanti Om (2007)

simulated_ratings.title: Ticket To Romance (En enkelt til Korsør) (2008)

simulated_ratings.feeling: An interesting literary-film curiosity I admire more than I love.
